azurerm_storage_queue.description: Manages a Queue within an Azure Storage Account.

name.description: The name of the Queue which should be created within the Storage Account. Must be unique within the storage account the queue is located.

storage_account_name.description: Specifies the Storage Account in which the Storage Queue should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

metadata.description: A mapping of MetaData which should be assigned to this Storage Queue.

id.description: The ID of the Storage Queue.

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Queue.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Queue.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Queue.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Queue.
